main event: A civilian in Dalton, Georgia reported seeing an aircraft flying very low over his driveway at high speed.
interesting points: The aircraft was described as dashing over the driveway without making any sound., The observer had two children who also witnessed the sighting., The aircraft was seen for only one second., The aircraft had navigation lights, which were green., The sighting was reported to the Superintendent of Flight Service for further investigation.
witness description: a civilian and his two children aged 14 and 16
